description:
#dndtrap #craft #riseoftiamat
Visit my Amazon affiliated links to pick up supplies for this craft:
Bones Miniatures: https://amzn.to/2sliFLR
https://amzn.to/2sliTTd
Elmer's Glue All: http://amzn.to/2gAQi9P
Gluegun:  http://amzn.to/2gYKRhV
Foam Ball: https://amzn.to/2L9xRCN
High Power Air Circulator with Adjustable Tilt: https://amzn.to/2JRgw1F

Learn to make this deadly bone ball death trap model for all your miniature 28mm tabletop games such as Dungeons and Dragons and Pathfinder. This easy craft will save you valuable time, so you have more hours to play the games you love. The materials to craft the trap are also cheap and easy to obtain so this project wonâ€™t break your budget. Bring a few crafting supplies and sit down with DM Scotty to begin your DIY crafting adventure. You can find the tools you need at my website ( http://www.thedmscraft.com/ ). So grab your gluegun and Go Forth and Craft.

The Tabletop Crafters Guild Site:
http://www.tabletopcraftersguild.com/

Become a friend to the Craft and help me bring more content to the community by joining my Patreon. You will have access to exclusive DM Scotty content:  https://www.patreon.com/theDMsCraft?ty=h

Join The Tabletop Crafters Guild Facebook group for more crafts and camaraderie. 
https://www.facebook.com/groups/dmscottyscraftsngames/

Twitter: @TheDMsCraft
title: Rolling Ball of Boney Death Dungeons and Dragons Trap (DM's Craft/ Short Tip #109)
